CooCoon Privacy Policy

EFFECTIVE DATE: 15 July 2016

On July 15, we published our Privacy Policy. Your continued use of CooCoon means you agree to this document, so please take a few minutes to read and understand it.

The CooCoon mobile application and services, as well as CooCoon websites and services (the "Sites") and any content therein (collectively, the "Services") offer users a forum to interact with other CooCoon users in the same area, in order to post and share comments, and to respond to comments posted by others. In this Privacy Policy ("Policy"), we describe how we collect, use, and disclose information that we obtain about users of our Services, which are available via mobile applications (the "App") and/or the Sites.

What Information We Collect

Account Information. When you first launch the App and/or the Sites, we assign you a user id but we do not require you to provide your name or email address.

We may also collect the following information:

Geolocation Data. We ask you to share your location information from your mobile device . If you choose not to, the Services will not function.  Location information is used to place you in your local CooCoon group, to place you in your home CooCoon group, and as explained below.  You can revoke your consent by changing the settings or preferences on your device and/or computer or by deleting CooCoon from your device.

Your Content and Usage. We collect any content you submit to the Services, information about the content, such as when you submitted it, and any metadata that is provided with the content.

Telephone Number. We may ask you to provide and verify your telephone number.  This process may be triggered, for example, if you want to post content, share a coon or if we suspect improper activity on your account.

Other Information you Provide to Us. When you interact with our Services or otherwise communicate with CooCoon in any way, we will collect the information you choose to share with us.

Information We Collect Automatically. We may automatically collect information about your use of the Services such as: access time, device ID, application ID or other unique identifier; domain name, IP address, screen views; geo-location data (with your permission); language information; device name and model; operating system information; your activities within the Services; and the length of time that you are logged in.  We may combine this information with other information that we have collected about you.

Social Media Sites. You can like us on Facebook, follow us on Twitter, and promote us on other social media sites.  We collect information about who has liked us or followed us.  However, we don't associate your social media account with your CooCoon account.

How We Use Information We Collect

In general, we use the information we collect from and about you to provide and operate the Services, respond to your requests, and to provide customer service and technical support.  We may also use information:

  • To place you in your local CooCoon group so that you can post and review content based on your current location.

  • To place you in your home CooCoon group so that you can post and review content in your community even when you are away.

  • To verify your identity and prevent impersonation, spam or other unauthorized or illegal activity.

  • To better understand how users access and use our Services, both on an aggregated and individualized basis, in order to improve our Services and respond to user desires and preferences, and for other research and analytical purposes.

How We Share Information

You cannot control who views any content you post on a CooCoon feed, as it is publicly available. So, if you don’t want to share something publicly, don’t post it.

The information we collect, including personally identifiable information, may be shared as follows:

  • CooCoon Users. Any information that you post or send will be shared with other users and potentially the public at large, depending on the type of feature that you are using. For example, any posts on a CooCoon feed are available to all other users and may be publicly distributed.

  • Service Providers. We may disclose the information we collect to third party vendors, service providers, contractors or agents who perform functions on our behalf.

  • Business Transfers. We may transfer the information we have collected to another company in connection with, or during negotiations of, any merger, sale of company assets, financing, or acquisition of all or a portion of our business.

  • In Response to Legal Process. We also may disclose the information in order to comply with the law, a judicial proceeding, court order, subpoena, or other legal process. For example, we may share your IP address or other identifier, your location information, or any other information we have collected about you and your device.

  • To Protect Us and Others. We also may disclose information if we believe it is necessary to investigate, prevent, or take action regarding illegal activities, suspected fraud, situations involving potential threats to the safety of any person, violations of our Terms of Service or this Policy, or as evidence in litigation in which CooCoon is involved.

  • Aggregate and De-Identified Information. We may also share aggregate or de-identified information about users with third parties for marketing, advertising, research or similar purposes.

Third Party Analytics

We may use automated devices and applications, included those offered by third parties to evaluate usage of our Services.  We also may use other analytic means to evaluate our Services.  We use these tools to help us improve our Services, performance and user experiences. The information collected may include unique device identifiers, device manufacturer and operating system, IP address, browser type, session start/stop time, and user activity.

Changes to this Policy

This Policy is current as of the Effective Date set forth above.  We may change this Policy from time to time, so please be sure to check back periodically.  We will post any changes to this Policy at https://coocoon.co/privacy. If we make any changes to this Policy that materially affect our practices with regard to the personal information we have previously collected from you, we will endeavor to provide you with notice in advance of such change by highlighting the change on our Site, or providing notice in our mobile app.
